name: Serenade
content: As they fell all around you
因为他们都落在你身边
Wake up and look around you
我们已在我们的内部空间迷失
And the time is our own
As it blew all around you
Wake up and look around you
我们已在我们的内部空间迷失
And the time is our own
And it shines all around you
而它的光芒都在你身边
你已在我们的内部空间迷失
And the earth is your own
Wake up and look around you
我们已在我们的内部空间迷失
And the time is our own
Wake up and look around you
我们已在我们的内部空间迷失
And the time is our own
